messages.content:
Your task: As a AI developer and automations specialist, create a Linkedin post that has two parts: 1. an intelligent summary of the key insight from this article {{25.choices[].message.content}} which also incorporate my own thoughts, notes, and tone of voice here: {{1.`1`}}, and 2. the bitly link to the article itself: {{23.link}}

Do NOT repeat the link, it should only be present once. Use only a max of 2 hashtags, and use them before the link.

Output ONLY the post and nothing else

Your output should NOT include double quotations at the start and the end.
